About Us

Who We Are

Les Soeurs Enterprise Corporation was founded in year 2016 by four sister who have passion in acquiring real estate assets and turning them into profitable spaces. Our common desire is to deliver a truly outstanding fit-out solution and to provide exceptional practices related to Property Management and Real Estate services. Providing a comfortable space that suits our clients’ lifestyle and considering it as our own is our way of business.

Mission Statement

Les Soeurs Enterprise Corporation strives to achieve excellence in delivering fit-out solutions and related real estate services that encourage continual innovation, creativity and sustainable development. Our aim is to significantly contribute to adding value to our projects and therefore meeting beyond our clients’ satisfaction.
